txt.en: This collar is cold to the touch and sends a chill down your spine. You cannot read the evil runes upon it, but perhaps Saeradan can.
'I know these runes well enough to know that the tongue written hereupon is the Black Speech. I will investigate this further.'
You found a black collar marked with evil-looking runes upon the corpse of one of the Druggavar you slew.
Bring the collar to Saeradan at Echad Saeradan
Saeradan is at Echad Saeradan, south-west of Gavar Cadlus.\n\nYou should bring the collar you found to Saeradan for his examination.
